column1: We are united as brothers, because jast as Handicar has taken away jobs from honest, hard-working cab drivers, it's also taken food  from the mouths of the children of car salesmen!
Aaand, because he's handicapped, he can use special access points and parking spaces. That kid was born with an unfair advantage!
Hey wake up, you little scab!
We got a message for ya! From the union.
Yeah. We snuck in his room last night and we... broke his legs!
